Package jade.core

Class AgentServicesTools

java.lang.Object
jade.core.AgentServicesTools
public final class AgentServicesTools extends Object
tools to help the use of the Directory Facilitator (registration to a service, find agents that have declared a service)
Author:
revised by Emmanuel ADAM

    • AgentServicesTools

      public AgentServicesTools()

  • Method Details

    • createAgentDescription

      public static DFAgentDescription createAgentDescription(String typeService, String nameService)
      create an Agent Description (model of a service)
      Parameters:
      typeService - type of the service
      nameService - name of the service (can be null)
      Returns:
      the model of the service

    • getAgentDescription

      public static DFAgentDescription getAgentDescription(Agent a, String typeService, String nameService)
      add a description of service to an agent description tof a given agent
      if the agent does'nt own a agent description, a new one is created
      Parameters:
      a - the agent taht request the addition of a service to its agent description
      typeService - type of the service
      nameService - name of the service (can be null)
      Returns:
      the model of the service

    • generateTopicAID

      public static AID generateTopicAID(Agent agent, String topicName)
      Parameters:
      agent - the agent that create or retrieve the topic
      topicName - the topic name
      Returns:
      the AID relative to the topic topicName for manage 'radio', broadcast message

    • deregisterService

      public static void deregisterService(Agent myAgent, DFAgentDescription model)
      deregister an agent from a service with the Directory Facilitator
      Parameters:
      myAgent - agent that have to be registered
      model - description of the service to deregister for this agent

    • deregisterAll

      public static void deregisterAll(Agent myAgent)
      deregister an agent from all its services with the Directory Facilitator
      Parameters:
      myAgent - agent that have to be registered

    • register

      public static DFAgentDescription register(Agent myAgent, String typeService, String nameService)
      register an agent to a service with the Directory Facilitator
      Parameters:
      myAgent - agent that have to be registered
      typeService - type of the service
      nameService - name of the service (could be null but it is prefered to use a name (like the agent name)

    • searchAgents

      public static AID[] searchAgents(Agent myAgent, String typeService, String nameService)
      search agents that are registered to a typical service
      Parameters:
      myAgent - agent that asks for the search (it will be omitted from the result)
      typeService - type of the service
      nameService - name of the service (can be null)
      Returns:
      AIDs of the agents that are registered to (_typeService, _nameService), do not include the AID of myAgent
